subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: The Englishmen Justin Rose, Luke Donald, Ian Poulter and Lee Westwood figure to be among the favorites at the U.S. Open, but none of them has won one of the four major tournaments.
snippet: The Englishmen Justin Rose, Luke Donald, Ian Poulter and Lee Westwood figure to be among the favorites at the U.S. Open, but none of them has won one of the four major tournaments.
